name: BIOLER WORLD AFRICA
content: A mix of trade fairs and seminars, BOILER WORLD-AFRICA is a global networking & progress-driven platform that brings together the global boiler & allied community under one roof. The event shall witness leading companies from various industries such as boiler & allied product manufacturers, service providers, engineering & steam solution providers, pharmaceutical, food & beverage, chemical, power generation, sugar, textile, steel, pulp & paper, paints & dyes, refineries, distilleries etc. With visitors from across continents, this global event will offer an unmatchable platform for exhibitors and visitors.
organizers: Ministry of Industrialization, Trade & Enterprise Development
